alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 3:48PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northwestern Hunterdon, southwestern Warren, eastern Berks, Lehigh, Montgomery, northwestern Bucks, Chester, central Delaware and Northampton Counties through 430 PM EST... At 347 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds along a cold front extending from Walnutport to near Fleetwood to near Parkesburg. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Allentown, Reading, Easton, West Chester, Bethlehem, Norristown, Pottstown, Phoenixville, Lansdale, West Norriton, Forks, East Norriton, Coatesville, Emmaus, Westtown, Northampton, Quakertown, Perkasie, Wilson and Downingtown. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 296 and 333. Northeast Extension between mile markers 21 and 71. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 332. Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 43 and 76. Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 10 and 19. Interstate 176 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
